channel.title: Npc exp

item.title: Npc exp
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

where do i add
if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double)(20 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
and is that all i need?

Read full topic
